text: Henryk Adam Aleksander Pius Sienkiewicz (May 5, 1846 – November 15, 1916) was a Polish journalist and Nobel Prize-winning novelist. ==Works== * Quo Vadis (made into an Oscar-winning film starring Peter Ustinov) * In Desert and Wilderness () * The Teutonic Knights () * The trilogy: The Fire and the Sword (), The Deluge () and Colonel Wołodyjowski (). Category:1846 births Category:1916 deaths Category:Polish journalists Category:Polish novelists Category:Polish Nobel Prize winners
title: Henryk Sienkiewicz
